name: Better Wishlist
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
• Lets users save their favourite products and find them easily at a later time
  • Super simple interface to create amazing Wishlist instantly
  • Flexibility to add the Wishlist menu in anywhere you want
  • Boost your sales by adding Wishlist on your WooCommerce shop
  • Complete Free to customizable the appearance

🚀 Enhance the Customer Experience of Your Website

With Better Wishlist, your customers will be able to easily save/bookmark their favorite products on their account and quickly find out the products when they want to buy them in future.

【–】Place the Wishlist Button Anywhere You Want

You can display your wishlist section anywhere on the website whether that’s on product, shop, account or any other pages.

🎨 Fully Customizable

You can customize the Wishlist button anyway you prefer and create an amazing Wishlist of your WooCommerce store within a few clicks.

🚀BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

Better Wishlist plugin is brought to you by the team behind WPDeveloper, a dedicated marketplace for WordPress, trusted by 3,000,000+ happy users.

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our [Documentation](LINK HERE)

  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin forum

  • For more information about features, FAQs and support, reach us from HERE

💙 LOVED Better Wishlist?

  • Join our Facebook Group
  • If you love Better Wishlist, [rate us on WordPress](LINK HERE)

🔥 WHAT’S NEXT

If you like Better Wishlist, then consider checking out our other WordPress Plugins:

🔝Essential Addons For Elementor – Most popular Elementor extensions with 1,000,000+ active users in the WordPress repository.

🔔NotificationX – Best Social Proof & FOMO Marketing Solution to increase conversion rates.

⏰SchedulePress – Complete solution for WordPress Post Scheduling to manage schedules through an editorial calendar & Social Share.

🗒️BetterDocs – Best Documentation & Knowledge Base Plugin for WordPress, which also reduce your manual support request.

🔗 BetterLinks: Latest best WordPress link management plugin for link shortening, tracking & analyzing.

📄 EmbedPress: EmbedPress lets you embed anything including videos, images, posts, audio, maps and upload PDF, DOC, PPT etc.

☁ Templately: Ultimate Template clouds with 1000+ ready templates for Elementor & Gutenberg along with FREE cloud collaboration with your team

⭐ ReviewX: WooCommerce Product review plugin that allows users to submit product reviews with multiple criteria, photos, videos, and more.

⚡ Flexia: Most lightweight, customizable & multi purpose theme for WordPress.

Visit WPDeveloper to learn more about how to do better in WordPress with Help Tutorial, Tips & Tricks.
sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.
  2. Search For “Better Wishlist”.
  3. Install, then Activate it.

Old Way:

  1. Upload better-wishlist to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where Can I Get Support?

You can get support from here

Do I Need Coding Skills To Use A Better Wishlist?

Not at all. You can set up everything your team needs without any coding knowledge. We made it super easy.
sections.changelog:
0.0.3 – 11/07/2023

  • Added: Mini Wishlist
  • Few minor bug fixes & improvements

0.0.2 – 20/06/2023

  • Improved: Wishlist page product price
  • Improved: Wishlist page table columns
  • Added: Read more button for out of stock products
  • Added: Wishlisted button style settings
  • Added: Icon support on wishlist buttons
  • Added: Ajax loader icon
  • Few minor bug fixes & improvements

0.0.1 – 03/03/2022

  • Initial beta release
